typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{identity/LineItemId} as string,
		{identity/TimeInterval} as string,
		{bill/InvoiceId} as string,
		{bill/BillingEntity} as string,
		{bill/BillType} as string,
		{bill/PayerAccountId} as long,
		{bill/BillingPeriodStartDate} as timestamp,
		{bill/BillingPeriodEndDate} as timestamp,
		{lineItem/UsageAccountId} as long,
		{lineItem/LineItemType} as string,
		{lineItem/UsageStartDate} as timestamp,
		{lineItem/UsageEndDate} as timestamp,
		{lineItem/ProductCode} as string,
		{lineItem/UsageType} as string,
		{lineItem/Operation} as string,
		{lineItem/AvailabilityZone} as string,
		{lineItem/ResourceId} as string,
		{lineItem/UsageAmount} as double,
		{lineItem/NormalizationFactor} as string,
		{lineItem/NormalizedUsageAmount} as string,
		{lineItem/CurrencyCode} as string,
		{lineItem/UnblendedRate} as double,
		{lineItem/UnblendedCost} as double,
		{lineItem/BlendedRate} as double,
		{lineItem/BlendedCost} as double,
		{lineItem/LineItemDescription} as string,
		{lineItem/TaxType} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
